sentences.en: "I blame the selectors," quoth he.
sentences.cn: “我认为错在那些遴选者，”他说。

sentences.en: A freak storm was to blame for the power outage.
sentences.cn: 停电的起因是一场特大暴风雪

sentences.en: Don’t blame me – it’s not my fault.
sentences.cn: 别来怪我——又不是我的错。

sentences.en: He slammed the door and stormed off. I could hardly blame him.
sentences.cn: 他砰的一声关上门，气呼呼地走了。也难怪他会这么做。

sentences.en: he was &B{to blame for} their deaths.
sentences.cn: 他应对他们的死亡负责。

sentences.en: he was becoming impatient and I couldn't blame him.
sentences.cn: 他开始不耐烦，我不怪他。

sentences.en: I always get the blame (= am blamed ) for his mistakes!
sentences.cn: 他的错总是我来背黑锅！

sentences.en: I blame his mother. She does everything for him.
sentences.cn: 怪他母亲不好，她什么事都要为他做。

sentences.en: I don't blame you for thinking that way.
sentences.cn: 你那样想，我不怪你。

sentences.en: It is the easy way out to blame others for our failure.
sentences.cn: 把我们的失败归罪到别人头上倒是省事。

sentences.en: It's not good enough just to blame the unruly children.
sentences.cn: 对难管教的孩子只是责备是不够的。

sentences.en: Ministers can equally credibly claim that the opposition is to blame.
sentences.cn: 部长们也能同样令人信服地宣称，反对派应该受到指责。

sentences.en: Ms Carey appeared to blame her breakdown on EMI's punishing work schedule.
sentences.cn: 凯丽女士似乎将她的精神崩溃归咎于百代唱片公司高度紧张的工作日程安排。

sentences.en: She refused to lay the blame on any one party.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝归咎于任何一方。

sentences.en: She seemed to be placing most of the blame on her mother.
sentences.cn: 她好像把大部分责任都推到了母亲身上。

sentences.en: Talk things through in stages. Do not accuse or apportion blame.
sentences.cn: 把事情按部就班地讲清楚。不要责难或归罪于人。

sentences.en: The blame for the Charleston fiasco did not lie with him.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯顿惨败错不在他。

sentences.en: The President absolved his officers and took the blame upon himself.
sentences.cn: 总统赦免了手下的官员，把过失揽到自己的头上。

sentences.en: The president put the blame squarely on his opponent.
sentences.cn: 总统将责任完全归咎于对手。

sentences.en: There was some wrangling between creditors about who was to blame.
sentences.cn: 债主们就谁该承担责任争论了好一阵。

sentences.en: Thick patchy fog and irresponsible driving were to blame.
sentences.cn: 局部浓雾和驾驶员不负责任是罪魁祸首。

phrases.tran_cn: 对…应负责任；应该为某事负责任

phrases.phrase: I don't (或 can't) blame you (或 her 等)
phrases.tran_cn: 我不会责怪你（或她等），我表示理解
起因是：是…起因或某事的根源的

trans.tran_cn: 责备，（对坏事应负的）责任
trans.tran_en: responsibility for a mistake or for something bad
to say or think that someone or something is responsible for something bad
